questions.prompt: A border village is under siege at dawn. What is your first move?

options.text: Raise a shield wall and hold the gate.
Lead a rooftop flank to break their formation.
Invoke warding sigils to shatter siege engines.
Smuggle civilians out through hidden culverts.

questions.prompt: A relic puzzle has no obvious pattern. How do you solve it?

options.text: Force the mechanism until it yields.
Test delicate movements and timing.
Translate runic layers and infer intent.
Ask what the relic was built to protect.

questions.prompt: You suspect a traitor inside your guild. What approach do you take?

options.text: Confront everyone publicly and demand truth.
Observe habits and follow subtle tells.
Read aura residue on compromised ledgers.
Listen for motives before deciding guilt.

questions.prompt: A storm tears your ship's mast at night. Your instinct says:

options.text: Brace and row hard straight through.
Trim rigging fast and dance the currents.
Cast a wind-binding rite from the prow.
Coordinate the crew and keep morale steady.

questions.prompt: In a packed tavern, a rival calls you weak.

options.text: Accept a direct brawl, no tricks.
Win with footwork and controlled feints.
Embarrass them with a harmless illusion.
Defuse it with humor and buy them a drink.

questions.prompt: An ancient spirit offers one boon. You choose:

options.text: Strength enough to break iron.
Perfect control over every movement.
Sight into hidden currents of magic.
The power to heal fear in others.

questions.prompt: You command a mixed squad in a collapsing pass.

options.text: Take point and punch an exit route.
Split teams for precision movement and timing.
Anchor the pass with a ritual barrier.
Retreat in order, no one left behind.

questions.prompt: A cursed forest shifts paths each hour.

options.text: Mark trees and force a straight route.
Track wind and moss to read subtle signs.
Map ley-lines and walk where they align.
Speak to local guardians and ask passage.

questions.prompt: Your closest companion is badly wounded mid-mission.

options.text: Carry them out yourself and keep fighting.
Stabilize quickly, then scout the safest route.
Channel a focused restoration sigil.
Abort objective and prioritize their life.

questions.prompt: A ruler offers you prestige in exchange for loyalty.

options.text: Accept if it grants real military authority.
Accept quietly and stay independent in practice.
Decline and pursue forbidden research instead.
Negotiate terms that protect common folk first.

questions.prompt: You must retrieve a codex from a mage vault.

options.text: Break the lock and endure whatever triggers.
Bypass each tumbler with exact pressure.
Dispel the wards one schema at a time.
Convince the curator spirit to grant access.

questions.prompt: Two villages dispute a scarce spring.

options.text: Enforce order with clear, hard limits.
Design a timed sharing schedule and monitor it.
Purify nearby wells through ritual work.
Bring leaders together until they agree.

questions.prompt: A formal duel allows only one technique.

options.text: Pick a heavy strike and commit.
Pick precise footwork and spacing.
Pick arcane blade-binding.
Pick a style that reads your opponent's fear.

questions.prompt: You discover a forbidden library beneath a ruin.

options.text: Take the battle manuals and leave quickly.
Catalog everything with meticulous notes.
Study dangerous spells despite the risk.
Search for records of those forgotten by history.

questions.prompt: A beast hunt goes cold with no tracks left.

options.text: Bait it and face it head-on.
Lay silent traps along likely paths.
Use scrying ash to reveal heat traces.
Track ecosystem signs and avoid needless kill.

questions.prompt: At a moon festival, you are asked to perform.

options.text: Demonstrate feats of strength and endurance.
Perform a precise weapon dance.
Stage a spell tapestry of light.
Lead a story-song that unites the crowd.

questions.prompt: You find an unstable potion prototype in your camp.

options.text: Test it on yourself immediately.
Measure dose and refine the formula.
Reverse-engineer the catalyst lattice.
Secure it until everyone understands the risks.

questions.prompt: A recurring dream warns of a coming invasion.

options.text: Train relentlessly and harden defenses now.
Scout border routes and map weaknesses.
Consult seers and decode prophetic symbols.
Build alliances before panic spreads.

questions.prompt: Your apprentice causes a dangerous accident.

options.text: Contain it physically, then lecture later.
Guide them through corrective steps under pressure.
Stabilize the field and analyze the error.
Prioritize trust so they learn without fear.

questions.prompt: You can leave behind one legacy for your order.

options.text: An oath of courage that never yields.
A codex of technique and adaptive tactics.
A grimoire that binds steel and sorcery.
A vow that power must serve people first.
